definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: insolent, presumptuous:—´[[ז]] Pr 21:24; pl. [[זֵדִים]] Je 43:2 + 11 t.;—alw. masc., and alw. of opposition to ´[[י]], wickedness; with qualified noun expressed, only [[הָאֲנׇשִׁים הַזֵּדִים]] Je 43:2, of opponents of Jerem.; elsewh. used substantively, as. term. techn. for godless, rebellious men; once sg. [[זֵד יׇהִיר לֵץ שְׁמוֹ]] Pr 21:24 a haughty insolent one, scorner is his name (‖[[עוֹשֶׂה בְּעֶבְרַת זׇדוֹן]]); usu. pl. Is 13:11(´[[גְּאוֹן ז]]; ‖[[גַּאֲוַת עָרִיחִים]]); Mal 3:13 (‖[[עשֵׁׂי רִשְׁעָה]]), v:Mal 4:1 (‖[[רִשְׁעָה עשֵׁׂה]]); and in Ps 86:14 (‖[[עָרִיחִים]]), Ps 119:21(‖[[מִמִּחְוֹתֶיךָ הַשּׁׂגִים]]), v:Ps 119:51, v:Ps 119:69, v:Ps 119:78, v:Ps 119:85, v:Ps 119:122; so prob. also Ps 19:14 [[גַּם מִזֵּדִים חֲשׂךְ עַבְדֶָּךָ]] also from presumptuous men hold back thy servant (Ew Ol Hup Che RV:m); > presumptuous sins Deal. (AVRV).
